description: Try our easy to follow Choc Dipped Cherries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Choc Dipped Cherries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Let any excess chocolate drip back into the bowl. Stand cherries on the tray. Refrigerate for 5 minutes until set. Note: Melt chocolate over simmering hot water.
